title: Carcinoma of the esophagus invading the trachea: Fluoroscopic and laryngoscopic observations
creator_credit: Medical Audio-Visual Institute and Association of American Medical Colleges
brief_description: Shows by means of endoscopic cinematography and cinefluorography, successive stages of an oesophageal carcinoma invading the trachea.
